road.title: Carbon Emissions Surge
road.desc: Each year, human activities release over 40 billion tons of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere, exacerbating global warming and causing extreme weather events.

stars.title: Biodiversity Loss Accelerates
stars.desc: Due to habitat destruction and climate change, species are going extinct at a rate 1,000 times faster than the natural background rate, jeopardizing ecosystems and food security.

wave.title: Melting Polar Ice
wave.desc: Polar ice is disappearing at an alarming rate, with the Arctic losing 12.8% of its ice cover each decade. This contributes to rising sea levels and threatens coastal communities.
